scripts.run-postgres: docker run -e POSTGRES_USER_FILE=/credentials/user -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD_FILE=/credentials/password -e POSTGRES_DB_FILE=/credentials/db -dp 127.0.0.1:5432:5432 --name jpez-postgres jpez-postgres
scripts.start-postgres: npm run build-postgres && npm run kill-postgres && npm run run-postgres
scripts.start-node: npm run build-node && npm run kill-node && npm run run-node
scripts.start-headed-node: npm run build-node && npm run kill-node && npm run run-headed-node
scripts.start: npm run start-postgres && npm run start-node
scripts.start-headed: npm run start-postgres && npm run start-headed-node
scripts.kill: npm run kill-postgres && npm run kill-node
